scenarios.title: At the Restaurant
scenarios.situation: Ordering food at a French restaurant

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.english: Good evening, do you have a reservation?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.french: Non, nous n'avons pas de réservation.
dialogue.english: No, we don't have a reservation.
dialogue.pronunciation: nohn, noo nah-vohn pah duh ray-zair-vah-syohn

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.french: Pas de problème. Suivez-moi, s'il vous plaît.
dialogue.pronunciation: pah duh proh-BLEM. swee-vay MWAH, seel voo PLAY

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.english: Can you recommend a dish to me?
dialogue.pronunciation: poo-vay voo muh ruh-koh-mahn-day uhn plah

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.french: Je recommande le coq au vin. C'est délicieux !
dialogue.english: I recommend the coq au vin. It's delicious!
dialogue.pronunciation: zhuh ruh-koh-mahnd luh kohk oh van. say day-lee-syuh

dialogue.speaker: Receptionist
dialogue.english: Hello, how can I help you?

dialogue.speaker: Guest
dialogue.french: J'ai une réservation au nom de Martin.
dialogue.english: I have a reservation under the name Martin.
dialogue.pronunciation: zhay oon ray-zair-vah-syohn oh nohm duh mar-TAN

dialogue.speaker: Receptionist
dialogue.french: Parfait ! Vous avez une chambre double pour deux nuits.
dialogue.english: Perfect! You have a double room for two nights.
dialogue.pronunciation: par-FAY! voo zah-vay oon SHAHM-bruh DOO-bluh poor duh nwee

dialogue.speaker: Guest
dialogue.french: À quelle heure est le petit-déjeuner ?
dialogue.pronunciation: ah kel uhr ay luh puh-tee day-zhuh-NAY

dialogue.speaker: Receptionist
dialogue.french: Le petit-déjeuner est servi de 7h à 10h.
dialogue.pronunciation: luh puh-tee day-zhuh-NAY ay sair-VEE duh set uhr ah dee uhr

dialogue.speaker: Doctor
dialogue.french: Bonjour, qu'est-ce qui vous amène aujourd'hui ?
dialogue.english: Hello, what brings you here today?
dialogue.pronunciation: bon-ZHOOR, kess kee voo zah-MEN oh-zhoor-DWEE

dialogue.speaker: Patient
dialogue.french: J'ai mal à la tête depuis trois jours.
dialogue.english: I have a headache for three days.
dialogue.pronunciation: zhay mahl ah lah tet duh-PWEE trwah zhoor

dialogue.speaker: Doctor
dialogue.french: Je vais vous prescrire des médicaments.
dialogue.english: I'm going to prescribe you some medication.
dialogue.pronunciation: zhuh vay voo pray-SKREER day may-dee-kah-MAHN
